name: Jewels Block: Puzzle Classic 2
description:
Jewels Block: Puzzle Classic 2 is a puzzle game where you arrange diamonds and gems in a fixed square. You will have to use your IQ to match logical blocks to fill a row/column of big squares. Therefore, our jewel block puzzle game is not just a game of fun, it is also an intellectual challenge.
Features:
- Newly various blocks and colorful graphics.
- Smooth and delicate animation.
- Simple and attractive.
- Easy to play but hard to master.
- Completely free.
- Good for relaxing and brainstorming.
